name: Devil May Cry
storyline: Hearing rumors of a city overrun by devils, dante decided to investigate. No sooner had he set foot in the city than he was attacked by inhuman foes...
summary:
Devil May Cry is a mobile game based on Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening.
This version of the game is a side-scroller action game with 2D graphics.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
